title: High School Diplomas in Bloomington, IN
question_text:
The U.S. Census Bureau website makes all of its data available to the public in a searchable format. For example you can find facts such as: $93\%$ of the residents of Bloomington, IN aged $25\text{ years}$ or older have earned their high school diploma (2013).
If a researcher from the University of Indiana takes many random samples of $35\text{ adults}$ (age $25$ or older) from Bloomington, IN, which of the following best describes the sampling distribution of the proportion who have earned their high school diploma?
